attributes.action: Allow learner drivers to practice with a member of their household
attributes.additional_details: Learners must exercise their freedom to do so safely, especially as many have finically invested in driving.
attributes.background: Just as Scotland and Wales, allow learner drivers to practice accompanied by a member of their household with a driving license. It is unjust, if theory test certificates are not being extended, while many learners have not been able to book lessons or tests and now not even practice privately.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559063
